textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
These deep waters are swarming with sleek fast Tuna,
 so watch out. Stay out of their way until you've
 grown large enough - then have a feast!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Get 'em while they're fresh! Schools of fish
 are easiest to catch when they first appear on the
 screen. Wait too long, and they'll scatter.
